projects.title: PerfectRep
projects.description: PerfectRep is a mobile application project developed as a technological solution to analyze and correct exercise technique in real-time for hypertrophy exercises. It uses artificial intelligence and computer vision to identify incorrect movements and provide immediate feedback. The app is designed for exercises like squats, deadlifts, shoulder press, and bicep curls, allowing use in various environments from gyms to home workouts.

projects.title: Educational Game in Game Maker
projects.description: Cyberstyle: SYNAPSE (CSS) is an educational video game designed to compare the effectiveness of two feedback systems, KCR and MTF, in learning. Focused on CSS concepts, it measured not only knowledge retention but also key dimensions like motivation, interest, and perceived usefulness, providing valuable data for educational analysis.

projects.title: PC Forge
projects.description: PC Forge is an educational web platform that guides users through the process of building their own PC. Through interactive steps, users learn about components, compatibility, and assembly while saving their progress.
